meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the conjunction of celestial bodies.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or occurring at the time of a conjunction of celestial bodies.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the period of time between two successive conjunctions of a celestial body with the sun.
